name: Energy Cycle Edge
description:
The main idea is the same: when you activate each cell in the game
field, it changes the colors of the cell and any adjacent cells in a
straight line. Each cell switches between three different colors, and
your task is to make them all match the same color.

In 'Energy Cycle Edge', most part of puzzles are three-dimensional, so
you'll need to monitor the changes of colors within several linked
layers, adding a new facet to the familiar gameplay.

Features:

  • 44 levels in 4 different sets

  • IDM/Ambient soundtrack from different artists

  • «Random colors» mode that allows you to go through any level multiple
    times

  • «Classic cells» mode for fans of the original game
